summary: The life and times of Cazuza, Brazilian singer/poet/enfant terrible, from his start with rock group "Barão Vermelho", to his death from Aids, in 1990, showing his career, love affairs, and involvement with drugs.
cast: Daniel de Oliveira|Marieta Severo|Reginaldo Faria|Andrea Beltrão|Leandra Leal|Emílio de Mello|Cadu Fávero|André Gonçalves|Arlindo Lopes|Dudu Azevedo|André Pfeffer|Eduardo Pires|Maria Flor|Fernanda Boechat|Pierre Santos|Vitor Hugo|Gustavo Berriel|Laura de Vison|Débora Falabella|Maria Mariana|André Moraes|Lucinha Araújo|Cazuza|Felipe Herzog
keywords: singer|brazil|man wears eyeglasses|brazilian singer|lgbt in brazil
title: Cazuza: O Tempo Não Pára
